info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 29 at 1:43PM MDT until June 29 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.description:
FFWEPZ
The National Weather Service in El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... The Seven Springs fire burn Scar in... North Central Otero County in south central New Mexico...
* Until 400 PM MDT.
* At 143 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Seven Springs fire burn Scar. Between 0.2 and 0.5 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
Excessive rainfall over the burn scar will result in debris flow moving through the Seven Springs Fire Burn Scar and downstream through Nogal and Laborcita Canyons. The debris flow can consist of rock, mud, vegetation and other loose materials.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding in and around the Seven Springs fire burn Scar.
SOURCE...Radar.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of areas in and around the Seven Springs fire burn Scar.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Upper Nogal Canyon, Lower Nogal Canyon, Bent, Burro Flats and Laborcita Canyon.
info.instruction: This is a life threatening situation. Heavy rainfall will cause extensive and severe flash flooding of creeks...streams...and ditches in the Seven Springs fire burn Scar. Severe debris flows can also be anticipated across roads. Roads and driveways may be washed away in places. If you encounter flood waters...climb to safety.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 4:00 PM MDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 4:00 PM MDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

info.senderName: NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued June 29 at 1:43PM MDT until June 29 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS El Paso Tx/Santa Teresa NM

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 4:00 PM MDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 4:00 PM MDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
